tasks.label: Build (Pip editable system install)
tasks.command: cmake -E env PIP_BREAK_SYSTEM_PACKAGES=1 LDFLAGS=-L/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/lib CFLAGS=-I/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include CPPFLAGS=-I/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/usr/include  python3.8 -m pip install -e ${workspaceFolder} --no-deps -v

tasks.label: Build (Pip regular system install)
tasks.command: cmake -E env PIP_BREAK_SYSTEM_PACKAGES=1 python3.8 -m pip install ${workspaceFolder} --no-deps -v
